info.name: Scrollbars for Messages in Mystical Equine
info.description: Will make messages scroll within a 500px box and provide matching scrollbars for messages for Mystical Equine in Chrome and IE.
info.additionalInfo:
By lluvia, #3245, with some help from Wizard Thefe, #12 

How to use this:
1. Install Stylish for Chrome or Firefox.
2. Install this.
3. Enjoy and please provide feedback on my Suggestions board on ME. :D
